context_bundle.summary: PowerShell reference compendium - ss64.com (A-Z cmdlet reference), PowerShell Gallery (module repo), Pscx (community extensions - archives, junctions, hashes), PS1C (zip as PSDrive), PSScriptAnalyzer (linting), PoshCode style guide, Microsoft devblogs, ConEmu terminal, SAPIEN Studio IDE.

onboarding.quick_start: Reference: ss64.com/ps (cmdlet A-Z). Gallery: powershellgallery.com. Extensions: Pscx (Install-Module Pscx). Style: github.com/PoshCode/PowerShellPracticeAndStyle. Blog: devblogs.microsoft.com/powershell. Terminal: ConEmu or Windows Terminal. IDE: SAPIEN PowerShell Studio.
common_patterns: ss64.com/ps - A-Z cmdlet reference with aliases
Install-Module Pscx - Community Extensions (archives, junctions, hashes)
Install-Module PS1C - Mount zips as PSDrive
known_errors: Pscx some cmdlets conflict with built-ins
ConEmu superseded by Windows Terminal for most uses
